text: USS Spica is a name used more than once by the United States Navy: * , a Sirus-class cargo ship commissioned by the U.S. Navy for service in World War II. * , a laid down, 1 April 1965, at Swan Hunter & Wigham Richardson Ltd., Wallsend-On-Tyne, United Kingdom for the Royal Navy as RFA Tarbatness (A-345) and launched, 1 February 1967. == References == Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Spica
